code_value:
ets_th1 You often go to school by bus, but why did you go to school on foot this morning?
ets_th2 I’m sorry, but you are really making too much noise.
ets_th3 What makes you so upset?
ets_th4 What do you think of the fairy tale Beauty and the Beast?
